attributes.action: Stop Pollok Country Park applying Car Parking Charges
attributes.additional_details:
I want the Government to reconsider and scrap these charges. It is absolutely diabolical that the people of Scotland should be charged to visit a country park. 
Actions speak louder than words, if the Government have genuine concern for the people this needs to be scrapped with immediate effect.
attributes.background:
Pollok Country Park is Glasgow's largest park and the only Country Park within Glasgow. 

Parking charges will apply from 6th April 2022

At a time when people are struggling to survive Glasgow City Council place further restrictions on the poor.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local parking charges are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
